	<b>Editor: see [PageEditAttributes]</b>
	----
&bull; *[global.font:* _font name_*]*
Sets the default editor font face for a wiki; default = _none_ ???.

&bull; *[global.wrap:* _wrap value_*]*
Sets the default wrap value for a wiki; default = _none_ but mostly a default of 70 is set in the WikiSettings page at creation of a wiki.
